questions.explanation:
Bennett Ludlow.

	Like Frasier, Ludlow was a psychiatrist. Frasier completely idolized the man.

James Karen.

	James Karen's real name is Jacob Karnofsky. He was born November 28, 1923 in Pennsylvania.

Carla.

	Fraiser was not happy at all about them dating. He couldn't believe someone like Ludlow would date someone as low class as Carla.

Carla.

	Carla already had five children. This pregnancy was her first where Nick Tortelli was not the father.

questions.text: What didn't Carla tell Frasier's mentor?
options: That she was married to Nick
That she was seeing another man
questions.explanation:
That she had children.

	As Carla put it, she didn't tell him they lived. Carla's other five children were Anthony, Seraphina, Gino, Ann Marie, and Lucia.

questions.text: Why did Carla miss the "how not to" class in school?
questions.explanation:
She was pregnant.

	Carla first got pregnant when she was in high school by Nick Tortelli. She said in another episode she never wanted to sleep with him but couldn't resist his charm.

questions.text: What was the only full proof method of birth control for Carla?
questions.explanation:
saying no.

	It was a long standing theme on "Cheers" that Carla was extremely fertile. In another episode she explained all a guy had to do was look at her and she would be pregnant.

questions.text: How did Carla describe her children?
questions.explanation:
Brady Bunch with knives.

	Carla herself was in a school for wayward children when she was younger because of her behavioral issues. Her children took after her and most people were afraid of them.

No.

	Ludlow would have been a great man for Carla but she turned him down. She said she had the ideal man and couldn't marry Ludlow in case this man came along.

questions.text: What did the gang at Cheers do at Carla's request?
options: Kicked her out of the bar
questions.explanation:
Left her alone.

	As they ignored her Carla said, "What are you people, made of stone?" She didn't want to admit she needed help and comfort because Carla did not like to show her vulnerable side.
